translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And what will make you realize what the Striking Disaster is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹It is˺ the Day people will be like scattered moths,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the mountains will be like carded wool.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So as for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: they will be in a life of bliss.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And as for those whose scale is light,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: their home will be the abyss.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And what will make you realize what that is?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
